author: Rachael Burford For Mailonline
title: MMA fighter knocked out after dancing in the ring | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Harding was doing so well he decided to offer up some dance moves to entertain the crowd and wind up his opponent. However, the joke was on him and his moment of comical mocking soon turned to disaster. Segas saw his opportunity and fired a high kick at the cocky fighter's head. However, the joke was on him and is moment of comical mocking soon turned into disaster. Segas saw his opportunity and fired a high kick at the cocky fighter's head Harding was knocked out cold. He was later able to leave the ring on his own two feet, suffering only from a sore head and extreme embarrassment Harding was knocked out cold. In revenge Segas pounces on him when he is on the floor and starts raining down punches. Harding was able to leave the ring on his own two feet, suffering only from a sore head and extreme embarrassment. Share or comment on this article 62
